summary: Adds a new spell that calls a Valkyrie from Sovngarde to help you fight your foes!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://s12.postimg.org/bkxs6kbul/vallogo1.png[/img][/center]

[color=red]*DESCRIPTION*[/color]
Adds a new spell, that call a Valkyrie from Sovngarde to fight by your side.
You must find a book called \"The Crusade of the Valkyries\" lost in Sovngarde. (See the screenshots to find out where).
It\'s a very simple mod, not background or custom content was created, because it was a fast creation for personal use.

[color=red]*VERSIONS*[/color]
Choose only one version.
-Vanilla version: the valkyrie uses vanilla hair and armor. Stand Alone and no other mods needed.
-Tera version: uses an armor from the Tera armors mod. You NEED the original armor mod and Apachii Hairs mod.
-ADEC version: uses a vanilla armor converted to ADEC. The armor is included in the .rar, but you NEED the Apachii Hairs mod.

[color=red]*REQUIREMENTS*[/color]
-Tera version
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27680]Tera armors For Skyrim - UNP by Toad[/url]0
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]

-ADEC version
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]

[color=red]*OTHER MODS*[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32986]Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC by Maevan2[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7782]ADEC Armor n Clothing Compilation by AcDale[/url]

[color=red]*INSTALLATION*[/color]
Open the .rar package, and drop the \"data\" folder into your Skyrim directory, replacing all files (this is because the folders, no files will be replaced because all of them are new).

[color=red]*SOME HELP*[/color]
I made this mod having in mind what the journey through Sovngarde was to the Dragonborn, he is not the same after that, and he got the power to call Valkyries to his aid, as a gift for saving Sovngarde from Alduin. That\'s why the book is in Sovngarde, you must be there to claim it...but if you aren\'t there yet, or you already been there and can\'t go there again...or simply you don\'t want to..you can teleport there using console commands.
-Using the console, type \"coc sovngarde01\" to teleport inside the hall, and look for the barrel.
-Use the \"coc whiterun\" command, you will be teleported outside Whiterun and back to the world, ready to unleash the wrath of the Valkyries!

*NOTES*
In my Skyrim, I use the Mature skin texture mod, so if you find something wrong with the skins, try downloading and using that mod.
Thanks to Bethesda, the Nexus and the Nexu\'s members for all related to Skyrim.
author: rocobest05
